<small>Also see: [[H7158]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵ֫פֶר‎</span><sub>185</sub> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.29.11|Isa 29:11]]</sup> ==missive, document, writing, book== (probably ancient loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šipru***</u></abbr>, ***missive***, ***message*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 683</sup>, Tel Amarna <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šipru, šipirtu***</u></abbr>, ***id.*** [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>TA Gloss</sup>; √ ***šâpâru, send, send message or letter*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 683</sup>, [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>l.c., whence</sup> also ***sâpiru, writer***, and (perhaps) ***ruler, šapirûtu, rule***; see [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Aufsätze (1892), 34</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup>; perhaps compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***go forth to journey***, II. ***send on a journey*** [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>1370</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סִיפְרָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 64</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> absolute [[2Sam.11.14|2Sam 11:14]] +; construct [[Exod.24.7|Exod 24:7]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפְרִי‎</span> [[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפְרְךָ‎</span> v[[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]]; [[Ps.139.16|Ps 139:16]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפָרִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.21.8|1Kgs 21:8]] +; — 

**1.** ***missive:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***letter*** of instruction, ***written order, commission***, or ***request***, usually from king, [[2Sam.11.14|2Sam 11:14]]; [[2Sam.11.15|2Sam 11:15]]; [[1Kgs.21.8|1Kgs 21:8]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.21.9|1Kgs 21:9]]; [[1Kgs.21.11|1Kgs 21:11]]; [[2Kgs.5.5|2Kgs 5:5]]; [[2Kgs.5.6|2Kgs 5:6]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.5.7|2Kgs 5:7]]; [[2Kgs.10.1|2Kgs 10:1]]; [[2Kgs.10.2|2Kgs 10:2]]; [[2Kgs.10.6|2Kgs 10:6]]; [[2Kgs.10.7|2Kgs 10:7]]; [[2Kgs.19.14|2Kgs 19:14]] = [[Isa.37.14|Isa 37:14]] compare [[2Chr.32.17|2Chr 32:17]]; [[2Kgs.20.12|2Kgs 20:12]] = [[Isa.39.1|Isa 39:1]] = ***written decree*** for publication [[Esth.1.22|Esth 1:22]]; [[Esth.3.13|Esth 3:13]]; [[Esth.8.5|Esth 8:5]]; [[Esth.9.20|Esth 9:20]]; [[Esth.9.25|Esth 9:25]]; [[Esth.9.30|Esth 9:30]] ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִגֶּרֶת‎</span> v[[Esth.9.25|Esth 9:25]] v[[Esth.9.29|Esth 9:29]], see above), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁלַח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפָרִים בְּיִד הָרָצִים בַּסּוּסִים רֹכְבֵי הָרֶכֶשׁ‎</span> [[Esth.8.10|Esth 8:10]]. — [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב ס‎</span> [[2Sam.11.15|2Sam 11:15]]; [[1Kgs.21.8|1Kgs 21:8]]; [[2Kgs.10.1|2Kgs 10:1]]; [[2Kgs.10.6|2Kgs 10:6]]; [[2Chr.32.17|2Chr 32:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב בַּסּ‎</span> (of specific contents) [[2Sam.11.15|2Sam 11:15]]; [[1Kgs.21.9|1Kgs 21:9]]; [[1Kgs.21.11|1Kgs 21:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהַֿסּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.5.7|2Kgs 5:7]] ***read the letter***]. — 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** from prophet [[Jer.29.1|Jer 29:1]], other influential persons v[[Jer.29.25|Jer 29:25]] v[[Jer.29.29|Jer 29:29]] . 

**2.** ***legal document***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּרִיתֻת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> ***certificate of divorce*** [[Deut.24.1|Deut 24:1]]; [[Deut.24.3|Deut 24:3]] and (figurative) [[Jer.3.8|Jer 3:8]]; [[Isa.50.1|Isa 50:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּקְנָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> ***deed of purchase*** [[Jer.32.11|Jer 32:11]]; [[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]] (strike out article), v[[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]] v[[Jer.32.14|Jer 32:14]] v[[Jer.32.16|Jer 32:16]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסּ‎</span> v[[Jer.32.10|Jer 32:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסְּפָרִים‎</span> v[[Jer.32.14|Jer 32:14]] (si vera lectio; strike out [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] compare [[BDB#Gf|Gf]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> v[[Jer.32.16|Jer 32:16]]b; v[[Jer.32.44|Jer 32:44]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> = ***indictment*** [[Job.31.35|Job 31:35]] (object of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתַב בְּ‎</span> = ***sign*** [[Jer.32.10|Jer 32:10]]; [[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]]; [[Jer.32.44|Jer 32:44]]). 

**3.** ***book***, or ***scroll***, in which something is written to preserve it for future use [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.18.9|Josh 18:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.10.25|1Sam 10:25]]; [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]]; [[Job.19.23|Job 19:23]] +; in form of roll, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָגֹ֫לוּ כַּסֵּפֶר הַשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Isa.34.4|Isa 34:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחָתוּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.11|Isa 29:11]]; [[Isa.29.12|Isa 29:12]] (see [[Jer.36|Jer 36]], etc., below); particular: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***book of prophecies*** [[Jer.25.13|Jer 25:13]]; [[Jer.30.2|Jer 30:2]] + 6 t. [[Jer.36|Jer 36]]; [[Dan.12.4|Dan 12:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲזוֺן נַחוּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Nah.1.1|Nah 1:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר י‎</span> [[Isa.34.4|Isa 34:4]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגִלַּת סֵפֶר‎</span> [[Jer.36.2|Jer 36:2]]; [[Jer.36.4|Jer 36:4]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְגִלָּה‎</span> v[[Jer.36.6|Jer 36:6]] + 6 t.; with many columns, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דְּלָתוֺת‎</span> v[[Jer.36.23|Jer 36:23]]), [[Ezek.2.9|Ezek 2:9]], compare [[Ps.40.8|Ps 40:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***geneal. register***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺלְדוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.5.1|Gen 5:1]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיַּ֫חַשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Neh.7.5|Neh 7:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***law-book***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּרִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Exod.24.7|Exod 24:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.23.2|2Kgs 23:2]] = [[2Chr.34.30|2Chr 34:30]]; [[2Kgs.23.21|2Kgs 23:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתּוֺרָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Deut.28.61|Deut 28:61]]; [[Deut.29.20|Deut 29:20]]; [[Deut.30.10|Deut 30:10]]; [[Deut.31.26|Deut 31:26]];  [[Deut.8.34|Deut 8:34]] (all [[BDB#D|D]]), [[2Kgs.22.8|2Kgs 22:8]] = [[2Chr.34.15|2Chr 34:15]]; [[2Kgs.22.11|2Kgs 22:11]]; [[Neh.8.3|Neh 8:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת אֱלֹהִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Josh.24.26|Josh 24:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Neh.8.8|Neh 8:8]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span>, so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]], compare Talmud<sup>***Nedarim*** 37 b</sup>), v[[Neh.8.18|Neh 8:18]]; [[Neh.9.3|Neh 9:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Chr.17.9|2Chr 17:9]]; [[2Chr.34.14|2Chr 34:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרַת משֶׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Josh.8.31|Josh 8:31]]; [[Josh.23.6|Josh 23:6]] (both [[BDB#D|D]]), [[2Kgs.14.6|2Kgs 14:6]]; [[Neh.8.1|Neh 8:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משֶׁה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Chr.25.4|2Chr 25:4]]; [[2Chr.35.12|2Chr 35:12]]; [[Neh.13.1|Neh 13:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***book*** of poems, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחֲמֹת י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Num.21.14|Num 21:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּשָׁר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Josh.10.13|Josh 10:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.1.18|2Sam 1:18]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***book*** concerned with kings, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֵּבְרֵי שְׁלֹמֹה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[1Kgs.11.41|1Kgs 11:41]], and especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דּבְרֵי הַיָּמִים לְמַלְכֵי וגו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.19|1Kgs 14:19]]; [[1Kgs.14.29|1Kgs 14:29]] + 31 t. Kings (18 t. of Israel, 15 t. of Judah), compare [[Esth.10.2|Esth 10:2]] (of Media and Persia); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּבְרֵי הַיָּמִים לַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּוִיד‎</span> [[1Chr.27.24|1Chr 27:24]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְפָּד‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]<sup>Hpt</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּלָכִים לִיהוּדָה וְיִשְׂרָאֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Chr.16.11|2Chr 16:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְכֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְהוּדָה וְיִשׁ‎</span> [[2Chr.25.26|2Chr 25:26]]; [[2Chr.28.26|2Chr 28:26]]; [[2Chr.32.32|2Chr 32:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיהוּדָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[2Chr.27.7|2Chr 27:7]]; [[2Chr.35.27|2Chr 35:27]]; [[2Chr.36.8|2Chr 36:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשׂ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[1Chr.9.1|1Chr 9:1]]; [[2Chr.20.34|2Chr 20:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָמְּלָכִים מִדְרַשׁ ס‎</span> [[2Chr.24.27|2Chr 24:27]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּבְרֵי הַיָּמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Neh.12.23|Neh 12:23]]; [[Esth.2.23|Esth 2:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזִּכְרֹנוֺת דִּבְרֵי הַיָּמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Esth.6.1|Esth 6:1]]. **feminine** ==once== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסְּפָרִים‎</span> [[Dan.9.2|Dan 9:2]] ***by means of the Scriptures*** (canonical books) compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Meinh|Meinh]] [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]<sup>Kau</sup>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** God's record-book, [[Ps.139.16|Ps 139:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זִכָּרוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Mal.3.16|Mal 3:16]] God's register of living, [[Exod.32.32|Exod 32:32]]; [[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> [[Ps.69.29|Ps 69:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסּ‎</span> [[Dan.12.1|Dan 12:1]] (citizens of Messianic kingdom). 

**4.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> = ***book-learning***, especially ***writing:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַע (הַ) סֵּפֶר‎</span> [[Isa.29.11|Isa 29:11]]; [[Isa.29.12|Isa 29:12]] (twice in verse) (of abilityto read); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְלַמְּדָם סֵפֶר וּלְשׁוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּשְׂדִּים‎</span> [[Dan.1.4|Dan 1:4]] ***to teach them the writing and speech of the Chaldeans*** (on construction see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:128a»§ 128a</sup>); more generally <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְחָכְמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכִּיל בְּכָלסֿ‎</span> v[[Dan.1.17|Dan 1:17]]. — [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> ***book*** is joined with verbs thus: it is written (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכָּפֶב‎</span>) [[Mal.3.16|Mal 3:16]] a thing is written <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסּ‎</span> [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]] + 20 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלסֿ‎</span> [[2Sam.1.18|2Sam 1:18]] + 50 t. ( + [[Jer.36.32|Jer 36:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַדְּיוֺ‎</span> ***with ink*** v[[Jer.36.18|Jer 36:18]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלסֿ‎</span> [[Jer.30.2|Jer 30:2]]; [[Jer.51.60|Jer 51:60]] conversely <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּרַשׁ מֵעַל ס‎</span> [[Isa.34.16|Isa 34:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַע מֵעַל ס‎</span> [[Jer.36.11|Jer 36:11]] see also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֻחָ֑קוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּסּ‎</span> [[Job.19.23|Job 19:23]] ***inscribe in a book***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֻקָּהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלסֿ‎</span> [[Isa.30.8|Isa 30:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתְבָהּ עַללֿוּחַ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחָה מִסּ‎</span> ***blot out of a book*** [[Exod.32.32|Exod 32:32]]; [[Exod.32.33|Exod 32:33]]; [[Ps.69.29|Ps 69:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא אֶתהַֿסּ‎</span> [[Jer.51.63|Jer 51:63]] ***read the book***, scroll, but usually <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא בְס‎</span> [[Jer.36.8|Jer 36:8]]; [[Jer.36.10|Jer 36:10]]; [[Jer.36.13|Jer 36:13]]; [[Neh.8.8|Neh 8:8]]; [[Neh.8.18|Neh 8:18]]; [[Neh.9.3|Neh 9:3]]; [[Neh.13.1|Neh 13:1]]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ס‎</span> in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִרְיַת ס‎</span>, see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> 



<small>Also see: [[H5615]]</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִפְרָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==book==; — suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲלאֹ בְּסִפְרָתֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Ps.56.9|Ps 56:9]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶר‎</span> **3 g**); strike out as gloss [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]. — compare also [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְפֹרָה‎</span>] below
